detail_desc: Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an elasticated frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.

Boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, an adjustable tab and metal buckle at the top and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the front and an elasticated hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the front and an elasticated hem.
All-in-one suit in a fine, marled knit with thermal fleece inside, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and raglan sleeves.
Glittery plastic Alice bands.
Imitation leather boots with rounded toes, covered heels and a high shaft with a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Soft slippers with a motif, loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Soft slippers with a motif, loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Soft slippers with a motif, loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.

Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with round toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Fitted V-neck dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a neckline with crossover ties at the back, and buttons down the front. Lined at the top.
Fitted V-neck dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a neckline with crossover ties at the back, and buttons down the front. Lined at the top.
Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with short puff sleeves and an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and diagonal zip that continues down one leg. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Zip down the front and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a soft fleece lining and pile-lined hood. Diagonal zip at the front that continues down one leg and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hems. Foldover edge at the cuffs and hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft, thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, chin guard, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and trim at the hems.
